articles.title: Perth Scorchers' 'Challenger' final moved from Optus Stadium to Manuka Oval amid Western Australia's COVID-19 chaos - Wide World of Sports
articles.description: New venue picked for 'Challenger' final
articles.content:
The BBL's 'Challenger' final set for Thursday night has been moved from Perth to Canberra after Western Australia was thrown into lockdown amid the COVID-19 crisis.
